publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6970 Pauline McNeill: Bonsai in the Botanics—That the Parliament welcomes the National Bonsai Exhibition to Glasgow; commends the Scottish Bonsai Association and the Glasgow Botanics Bonsai Group for their hard work in promoting what it considers to be this non-elitist art form, and looks forward to welcoming similar events to Glasgow’s Botanical Gardens in future. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
